Bank.description: When you play this, it's worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).
Bank.name: Bank

Bishop.description: +1VP. Trash a card from your hand. +VP equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.
Bishop.name: Bishop

City.description: If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.
City.name: City

Contraband.description: When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.
Contraband.name: Contraband

Counting House.description: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.
Counting House.name: Counting House

Expand.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.
Expand.name: Expand

Forge.description: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.
Forge.name: Forge

Goons.description: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. --While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1VP.
Goons.name: Goons

Grand Market.description: You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.
Grand Market.name: Grand Market

Hoard.description: While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.
Hoard.name: Hoard

King's Court.description: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.
King's Court.name: King's Court

Loan.description: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.
Loan.name: Loan

Mint.description: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.
Mint.name: Mint

Mountebank.description: Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.
Mountebank.name: Mountebank

Peddler.description: During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0.
Peddler.name: Peddler

Quarry.description: While this card is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
Quarry.name: Quarry

Rabble.description: Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discard the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.
Rabble.name: Rabble

Royal Seal.description: While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put it on top of your deck.
Royal Seal.name: Royal Seal

Talisman.description: While this card is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.
Talisman.name: Talisman

Trade Route.description: +1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat. Trash a card from your hand. Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, Move the token to the Trade Route mat.
Trade Route.name: Trade Route

Vault.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.
Vault.name: Vault

Venture.description: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.
Venture.name: Venture

Watchtower.description: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. --When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, trash that card or put it on top of your deck.
Watchtower.name: Watchtower

Border Village.description: When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.
Border Village.name: Border Village

Cache.description: When you gain this, gain two Coppers.
Cache.name: Cache

Cartographer.description: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.
Cartographer.name: Cartographer

Crossroads.description: Reveal your hand. +1 per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.
Crossroads.name: Crossroads

Develop.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 Coin less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.
Develop.name: Develop

Duchess.description: Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back. In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.
Duchess.name: Duchess

Embassy.description: Discard 3 cards. When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.
Embassy.name: Embassy

Farmland.description: When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $2 more than the trashed card.
Farmland.name: Farmland

Fool's Gold.description: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 Coin, otherwise it's worth 4 Coins. When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.
Fool's Gold.name: Fool's Gold

Haggler.description: While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.
Haggler.name: Haggler

Highway.description: While this is in play, cards cost $1 less, but not less than $0.
Highway.name: Highway

Ill-Gotten Gains.description: When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand. When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.
Ill-Gotten Gains.name: Ill-Gotten Gains

Inn.description: Discard 2 cards. When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.
Inn.name: Inn

Jack of All Trades.description: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back. Draw until you have 5 cards in hand. You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.
Jack of All Trades.name: Jack of All Trades

Mandarin.description: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck. When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.
Mandarin.name: Mandarin

Margrave.description: Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.
Margrave.name: Margrave

Noble Brigand.description: When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.
Noble Brigand.name: Noble Brigand

Nomad Camp.description: When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.
Nomad Camp.name: Nomad Camp

Oracle.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses. +2 Cards.
Oracle.name: Oracle

Scheme.description: At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.
Scheme.name: Scheme

Silk Road.description: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).
Silk Road.name: Silk Road

Spice Merchant.description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one: +2 Cards and +1 Action; or +$2 and +1 Buy.
Spice Merchant.name: Spice Merchant

Stables.description: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.
Stables.name: Stables

Trader.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins. When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a Silver.
Trader.name: Trader

Tunnel.description: When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.
Tunnel.name: Tunnel

Fairgrounds.description: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differnly named cards in your deck (rounded down).
Fairgrounds.name: Fairgrounds

Farming Village.description: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.
Farming Village.name: Farming Village

Fortune Teller.description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.
Fortune Teller.name: Fortune Teller

Hamlet.description: You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Action.  You may discard a card; If you do, +1 Buy.
Hamlet.name: Hamlet

Harvest.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.
Harvest.name: Harvest

Horn of Plenty.description: When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.
Horn of Plenty.name: Horn of Plenty

Horse Traders.description: Discard 2 cards. When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.
Horse Traders.name: Horse Traders

Hunting Party.description: Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't a duplicate of one in your hand and discard the rest.
Hunting Party.name: Hunting Party

Jester.description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.
Jester.name: Jester

Menagerie.description: Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.
Menagerie.name: Menagerie

Remake.description: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand then gain a card costing exactly 1 more than the trashed card.
Remake.name: Remake

Tournament.description: Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.
Tournament.name: Tournament

Young Witch.description: Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse. Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 or 3 to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.
Young Witch.name: Young Witch

Black Market.description: Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order. (Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.)
Black Market.name: Black Market

Envoy.description: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to dicard. Draw the rest.
Envoy.name: Envoy

Governor.description: Choose one: you get the version in parentheses. Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly 1 (2) more.
Governor.name: Governor

Stash.description: When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.
Stash.name: Stash

Walled Village.description: At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.
Walled Village.name: Walled Village

Ambassador.description: Reveal a card from your hand.  Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply.  Then each player gains a copy of it.
Ambassador.name: Ambassador

Caravan.description: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.
Caravan.name: Caravan

Cutpurse.description: Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).
Cutpurse.name: Cutpurse

Embargo.description: Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. (When you buy a card with an Embargo token on it, gain a Curse)
Embargo.name: Embargo

Explorer.description: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.
Explorer.name: Explorer

Fishing Village.description: At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.
Fishing Village.name: Fishing Village

Ghost Ship.description: Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.
Ghost Ship.name: Ghost Ship

Haven.description: Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.
Haven.name: Haven

Island.description: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.
Island.name: Island

Lighthouse.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.
Lighthouse.name: Lighthouse

Lookout.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.
Lookout.name: Lookout

Merchant Ship.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.
Merchant Ship.name: Merchant Ship

Native Village.description: Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your may at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.
Native Village.name: Native Village

Navigator.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.
Navigator.name: Navigator

Outpost.description: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive  turns.
Outpost.name: Outpost

Pearl Diver.description: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.
Pearl Diver.name: Pearl Diver

Pirate Ship.description: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.
Pirate Ship.name: Pirate Ship

Salvager.description: Trash a card from your  hand. +Coins equal to its cost.
Salvager.name: Salvager

Sea Hag.description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.
Sea Hag.name: Sea Hag

Smugglers.description: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.
Smugglers.name: Smugglers

Tactician.description: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your  next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.
Tactician.name: Tactician

Treasure Map.description: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.
Treasure Map.name: Treasure Map

Treasury.description: When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.
Treasury.name: Treasury

Wharf.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.
Wharf.name: Wharf

Baron.description: You may discard an Estate card.  If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.
Baron.name: Baron

Bridge.description: All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0.
Bridge.name: Bridge

Conspirator.description: If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.
Conspirator.name: Conspirator

Coppersmith.description: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.
Coppersmith.name: Coppersmith

Courtyard.description: Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
Courtyard.name: Courtyard

Ironworks.description: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; Treasure card, +1 Coin; or Victory card, +1 Card.
Ironworks.name: Ironworks

Masquerade.description: Each player passes a card from his hand o the left once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.
Masquerade.name: Masquerade

Mining Village.description: You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.
Mining Village.name: Mining Village

Minion.description: Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.
Minion.name: Minion

Pawn.description: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.)
Pawn.name: Pawn

Saboteur.description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.
Saboteur.name: Saboteur

Scout.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.
Scout.name: Scout

Secret Chamber.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this card from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, then put 2 cards from your hand to the top of your deck.
Secret Chamber.name: Secret Chamber

Shanty Town.description: Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.
Shanty Town.name: Shanty Town

Steward.description: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.
Steward.name: Steward

Swindler.description: Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.
Swindler.name: Swindler

Torturer.description: Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.
Torturer.name: Torturer

Trading Post.description: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a Silver card; put it into your hand.
Trading Post.name: Trading Post

Tribute.description: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is anAction card, +2 Actions; Treasure card, +2 Coins; or Victory card, +2 Cards.
Tribute.name: Tribute

Upgrade.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.
Upgrade.name: Upgrade

Wishing Well.description: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.
Wishing Well.name: Wishing Well

Alchemist.description: When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.
Alchemist.name: Alchemist

Apothecary.description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck.  Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck in any order.
Apothecary.name: Apothecary

Apprentice.description: Trash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs.  +2 Cards if there is a Potion in the cost.
Apprentice.name: Apprentice

Familiar.description: Each other player gains a Curse.
Familiar.name: Familiar

Golem.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.
Golem.name: Golem

Herbalist.description: When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.
Herbalist.name: Herbalist

Philosopher's Stone.description: When you play this card, count your deck and discard pile. Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).
Philosopher's Stone.name: Philosopher's Stone

Possession.description: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at the end of the turn.
Possession.name: Possession

Scrying Pool.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that is not an action. Take all of these revealed cards into your hand.
Scrying Pool.name: Scrying Pool

Transmute.description: Trash a card from your hand. If it is an...Action card, gain a Duchy; Treasure card, gain a Transmute; or Victory card, gain a Gold.
Transmute.name: Transmute

University.description: You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.
University.name: University

Vineyard.description: Worth 1VP for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).
Vineyard.name: Vineyard

Adventurer.description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure  cards. Put those Treasure cards into your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
Adventurer.name: Adventurer

Bureaucrat.description: Gain a Silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
Bureaucrat.name: Bureaucrat

Cellar.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.
Cellar.name: Cellar

Chancellor.description: You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.
Chancellor.name: Chancellor

Chapel.description: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
Chapel.name: Chapel

Council Room.description: Each other player draws a card.
Council Room.name: Council Room

Feast.description: Trash this card. Gain a card costing  up to 5 Coins.
Feast.name: Feast

Gardens.description: Worth 1VP for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).
Gardens.name: Gardens

Library.description: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.
Library.name: Library

Militia.description: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.
Militia.name: Militia

Mine.description: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 more; put it into your hand.
Mine.name: Mine

Moat.description: When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.
Moat.name: Moat

Moneylender.description: Trash a Copper card from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.
Moneylender.name: Moneylender

Remodel.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.
Remodel.name: Remodel

Spy.description: Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.
Spy.name: Spy

Thief.description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.
Thief.name: Thief

Throne Room.description: Choose an Action card in your  hand. Play it twice.
Throne Room.name: Throne Room

Witch.description: Each other player gains a Curse card.
Witch.name: Witch

Workshop.description: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
Workshop.name: Workshop

Altar.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.
Altar.name: Altar

Armory.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. Put it on top of your deck.
Armory.name: Armory

Band of Misfits.description: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.
Band of Misfits.name: Band of Misfits

Beggar.description: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand. ___ When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.
Beggar.name: Beggar

Catacombs.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards. ___ When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.
Catacombs.name: Catacombs

Count.description: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper. Choose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.
Count.name: Count

Counterfeit.description: When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.
Counterfeit.name: Counterfeit

Cultist.description: Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand. ___ When you trash this, +3 Cards.
Cultist.name: Cultist

Death Cart.description: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you dont, trash this. ___ When you gain this, gain two Ruins.
Death Cart.name: Death Cart

Feodum.description: Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck. ___ When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.
Feodum.name: Feodum

Forager.description: Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.
Forager.name: Forager

Fortress.description: When you trash this, put it into your hand.
Fortress.name: Fortress

Graverobber.description: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.
Graverobber.name: Graverobber

Hermit.description: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3. ___ When you discard this from play, if you didnt buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).
Hermit.name: Hermit

Hunting Grounds.description: When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates
Hunting Grounds.name: Hunting Grounds

Ironmonger.description: Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +$1; a Victory card, +1 Card.
Ironmonger.name: Ironmonger

Junk Dealer.description: Trash a card from your hand.
Junk Dealer.name: Junk Dealer

Knights.description: One of each, all shuffled into one Kingdom pile.
Knights.name: Knights

Madman.description: Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
Madman.name: Madman

Marauder.description: Gain a Spoils. Each other player gains a Ruins.
Marauder.name: Marauder

Market Square.description: When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.
Market Square.name: Market Square

Mercenary.description: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, + $2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
Mercenary.name: Mercenary

Mystic.description: Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If its the named card, put it into your hand.
Mystic.name: Mystic

Pillage.description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.
Pillage.name: Pillage

Poor House.description: Reveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of $0.
Poor House.name: Poor House

Procession.description: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.
Procession.name: Procession

Rats.description: Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats). ___ When this is trashed, +1 Card.
Rats.name: Rats

Rebuild.description: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.
Rebuild.name: Rebuild

Rogue.description: If there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.
Rogue.name: Rogue

Sage.description: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.
Sage.name: Sage

Scavenger.description: You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.
Scavenger.name: Scavenger

Spoils.description: When you play this, return it to the pile.
Spoils.name: Spoils

Squire.description: Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver. ___ When you trash this, gain an Attack card.
Squire.name: Squire

Storeroom.description: Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded the second time.
Storeroom.name: Storeroom

Urchin.description: Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand. ___ When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.
Urchin.name: Urchin

Vagrant.description: Reveal the top card of your deck. If its a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.
Vagrant.name: Vagrant

Wandering Minstrel.description: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.
Wandering Minstrel.name: Wandering Minstrel

Swamp Hag.description: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a curse
Swamp Hag.name: Swamp Hag
